repair11.name: Fasteners
repair11.comments: Check Tightness of all Critical Fasteners: hand controls, brake system, axle nuts, front fork components, riser and handle bar fasteners

repair12.comments: Inspect Exhaust System: leaks, cracks and loose or missing fasteners or heat shields
